TopicTitle: Make a wish... and have it granted as a better wish!

Articles.Content:
Granted, and the usually blue bar above his posts is now red as well!

I wish for a really soft and comfortable bed.

Granted, it ships with puppies (that are alive) and a lifetime supply of food and plastic poop bags for them.

I wish for an ES44AC.

Granted, you get and FT55BD!

I wish for more people to understand that Scott Manley has to be related to Captain Picard SOMEHOW

Granted! Everybody understands now! And because knowing Scott Manley is related to Captain Picard requires knowing who Captain Picard is and because that requires knowing what Star Trek is, Star Trek inspires countless millions to pursue a STEM carrier, boosting technological advancement by A LOT! After the first successful test of an Alcubierre-capable spaceship in 2063 (and an associated first-contact-event), everything else happens mostly according to the Star Trek backstory as well. Also, Scott Manley and his family are frozen cryogenically and woken up in the 24th century, when they serve aboard the USS Enterprise D under Captain Picard. Scott Manley and Captain Picard become good friends, a DNA test shows they are, in fact, related rather closely (taking into account the time difference).

I wish for a cybernetically improved body.

Granted: u're like Terminator but with feelings and senses and all that stuff.

I wish all flies and cockroaches were sent to Mars. (without me)

Granted. Only the Flies actually go to "mars". They are also changed so they can give no one anything other than a pat on the back.

I wish for lots of bacon and a Nyan Cat.

(No caps in mars means green screen set to look like Mars on Earth.)

10 BACON NYAN CATS!

I wish to fly of a cliff and die

Granted 

i wish wish for helix fossil ( hail helix)

Granted. You get helix fossil, and also a screwdriver that can fit into any screw.

I wish for a Neptune orbiter.

Granted. You also get infinite fuel for it.

I wish for Medieval Engineers
